text: @NYGovCuomo Yes and that would explain why NY has the highest number of cases and deaths of Covid-19 in the country.  When you have two democrat hacks like Cuomo and Diblasio this is what happens.  Thank goodness Trump swooped in to rescue you.  So sad!
